wargame.map

Class Shape

  • java.lang.Object
    • wargame.map.Shape
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    RockShape, TreeShape, WaterShape

    public abstract class Shape
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a shape. Any shape, randomly generated using the parameters.
    Author:
    Balthazar Pavot
